search_functionality.description: User stories related to searching for GitHub users

stories.title: Search for GitHub User
stories.description: As a user, I want to search for a GitHub user by entering their username so I can explore their profile and followers
acceptance_criteria: User can enter a username in the text field
User can tap 'Get Followers' button to search
User can press return key to submit search
App navigates to follower list screen on successful search

stories.title: Handle Empty Username Search
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a validation message when I try to search without entering a username so I know what to do
acceptance_criteria: Alert appears when 'Get Followers' is tapped with empty text field
Alert shows message 'Please enter a username. We need to know who to look for ðŸ˜€.'

stories.title: Dismiss Keyboard
stories.description: As a user, I want to dismiss the keyboard by tapping outside the text field for better user experience
acceptance_criteria: Keyboard dismisses when user taps outside text field

stories.title: Clear Text Field on Return
stories.description: As a user, I want the text field to be cleared when I return to the search screen so I can start fresh
acceptance_criteria: Text field is empty when returning to SearchVC
Text field is ready for new input

follower_browsing.description: User stories related to browsing and viewing followers

stories.title: View Followers in Grid
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a user's followers displayed in a grid layout so I can browse them visually
acceptance_criteria: Followers are displayed in a 3-column grid
Each follower shows avatar image and username
Grid layout adapts to different screen sizes
Loading indicator appears while fetching followers

stories.title: Pagination for Followers
stories.description: As a user, I want to scroll through all followers with pagination so I can see everyone
acceptance_criteria: More followers load when scrolling to bottom
Pagination stops when no more followers available

stories.title: Search Through Followers
stories.description: As a user, I want to search through the current followers by username so I can find specific people

stories.title: Empty State for No Followers
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a helpful message when a user has no followers so I understand the situation
acceptance_criteria: Empty state view appears when no followers
Shows 'This user has no followers. Go follow them!' subtitle

stories.title: Loading State During Fetch
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a loading indicator while followers are being fetched so I know the app is working
acceptance_criteria: Loading view appears during network requests
Loading view disappears when data loads
Loading view appears for pagination too

user_details.description: User stories related to viewing detailed user information

stories.title: View User Profile Details
stories.description: As a user, I want to tap on a follower to see their detailed profile information so I can learn more about them

stories.title: View User Statistics
stories.description: As a user, I want to see user statistics (repos, gists, followers, following) so I understand their GitHub activity
acceptance_criteria: Statistics are displayed with appropriate icons

stories.title: Access GitHub Profile
stories.description: As a user, I want to tap 'GitHub Profile' to open their GitHub profile in Safari so I can visit their repositories
acceptance_criteria: Safari shows user's GitHub profile page
Safari has green tint color matching app theme
User can navigate back to app

stories.title: View Account Creation Date
stories.description: As a user, I want to see when the user joined GitHub so I know how long they've been active
acceptance_criteria: Date appears at bottom of user info screen

stories.title: Get User's Followers
stories.description: As a user, I want to tap 'Get Followers' to see this user's followers so I can explore their network
acceptance_criteria: Navigates to FollowerListVC for that user
Shows loading while fetching their followers
Updates navigation title to new username

stories.title: Handle User with No Followers
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a message when trying to get followers for a user who has none so I understand the situation
acceptance_criteria: Alert appears when user has 0 followers
Alert shows 'This user has no followers. What a shame ðŸ˜ž.' message

favorites_management.description: User stories related to managing favorite users

stories.title: Add User to Favorites
stories.description: As a user, I want to add users to my favorites so I can quickly access them later
acceptance_criteria: Tapping '+' button in FollowerListVC adds user to favorites
Shows loading indicator during add process
Shows success alert 'You have successfully favorited this user ðŸŽ‰'
User is saved to local storage

stories.title: View Favorites List
stories.description: As a user, I want to view my saved favorites in a list so I can manage them
acceptance_criteria: Favorites tab shows list of saved users
Each favorite shows avatar and username
Tapping favorite navigates to their followers

stories.title: Remove User from Favorites
stories.description: As a user, I want to remove users from favorites by swiping so I can clean up my list
acceptance_criteria: Swiping left on favorite shows delete option
Tapping delete removes user from favorites
Row animates out with left swipe animation
User is removed from local storage

stories.title: Empty Favorites State
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a helpful message when I have no favorites yet so I know what to do
acceptance_criteria: Empty state view appears when no favorites
Shows 'Add a favorite on the follower list screen' subtitle

stories.title: Handle Duplicate Favorites
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a message when trying to add a user who is already in favorites so I know they're already saved
acceptance_criteria: Alert appears when trying to add existing favorite
Alert shows 'You've already favorited this user. You must REALLY like them!' message

navigation_ux.description: User stories related to navigation and user experience

stories.title: Tab Bar Navigation
stories.description: As a user, I want to navigate between Search and Favorites tabs so I can access different features
acceptance_criteria: Tab bar shows Search and Favorites tabs
Tapping Search tab shows search screen
Tapping Favorites tab shows favorites list
Active tab is highlighted in green

stories.title: Navigation Bar Behavior
stories.description: As a user, I want the navigation bar to behave appropriately on different screens so I have consistent navigation
acceptance_criteria: Follower list shows navigation bar with username title

stories.title: Error Handling
stories.description: As a user, I want to see appropriate error messages when something goes wrong so I understand what happened
acceptance_criteria: Network errors show 'Unable to complete your request. Please check your internet connection'
Invalid responses show 'Invalid response from the server. Please try again.'
Invalid data shows 'The data received from the server was invalid. Please try again.'
All errors have 'Ok' button to dismiss

stories.title: Success Feedback
stories.description: As a user, I want to see success messages when actions complete so I get positive feedback
acceptance_criteria: Adding to favorites shows success message
Success messages are positive and encouraging
Success messages auto-dismiss or have action button

api_integration.description: User stories related to API interactions and data handling

stories.title: Fetch User Followers
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to fetch followers from GitHub API so I can see real data
acceptance_criteria: API call to GitHub followers endpoint

stories.title: Fetch User Information
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to fetch detailed user information from GitHub API so I can see complete profiles
acceptance_criteria: API call to GitHub user endpoint

stories.title: Image Loading and Caching
stories.description: As a user, I want avatar images to load quickly and be cached so I have a smooth experience

stories.title: Handle Invalid Username
stories.description: As a user, I want to see an error when I search for a non-existent username so I know the user doesn't exist

data_persistence.description: User stories related to local data storage and persistence

stories.title: Save Favorites Locally
stories.description: As a user, I want my favorites to be saved locally so they persist between app launches
acceptance_criteria: Favorites load quickly on app launch

stories.title: Load Favorites on Launch
stories.description: As a user, I want my favorites to load automatically when I open the app so I can access them immediately
acceptance_criteria: Empty state shown if no favorites

accessibility.description: User stories related to accessibility and inclusive design

stories.title: VoiceOver Support
stories.description: As a user with visual impairments, I want the app to work with VoiceOver so I can navigate using screen reader

stories.title: Dynamic Type Support
stories.description: As a user, I want text to scale with my system font size preferences so I can read comfortably
acceptance_criteria: Text scales with Dynamic Type settings
Layout adapts to larger text sizes
No text truncation at larger sizes
UI remains functional at all sizes

performance.description: User stories related to app performance and optimization

stories.title: Smooth Scrolling Performance
stories.description: As a user, I want smooth scrolling through followers so I have a pleasant browsing experience
acceptance_criteria: No stuttering or lag during scroll

stories.title: Fast App Launch
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to launch quickly so I can start using it immediately

stories.title: Efficient Memory Usage
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to use memory efficiently so it doesn't slow down my device
acceptance_criteria: Images are properly cached and released
